text: II think you have to set up it just a bit differently. I had this problem before

Column type: foreign ID
Select Column: Tag Name

I use a separate named column for mine.  I’ll screenshot my main table and tag table so you can see how I have it set up
here is the column in the main table: <https://share.getcloudapp.com/kpu6ZLYn> and the edit column: <https://share.getcloudapp.com/ApuEmjrd>
here is foreign table: <https://share.getcloudapp.com/7KuAZ00b> — this works for me
